Constructor for initializing an error message indicating an unsupported permission type.

<Note>
  `UnsupportedPermissionTypeError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the
  docs for PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { UnsupportedPermissionTypeError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```
